articles.description: "Ncuti will be extraordinary."
articles.content:
Doctor Who star Jodie Whittaker has spoken about what the new era of the long-running BBC sci-fi show will bring once Ncuti Gatwa takes over the reins as the new Time Lord.
Speaking to Digital Spy a… [+1557 chars]
